exercise.title: Malicious Traffic Analysis - Part 4
exercise.name: mnta_p4
exercise.shortdescription: Analyze network traffic captured during a massive recon scan and attack.
exercise.description: Network traffic was captured against a "Big Bad Recon Scan". Analyze the traffic and determine who the attackers were and what was done against a network.
exercise.tutorial:
A new recon scan was released that supposedly makes it undetectable. Test your analytic skills against this type of attack.

The company has the following details:

  • 1 public IP address: 67.76.54.32
  • 1 corporate intranet

Analyze the PCAP using Wireshark and answer the questions below.

question.text: What was the second scan done against the router IP address: 67.76.54.32?
What were the two UDP ports scanned? Answer format: port # and port #
What ports were found open? Answer format: "11, 12, 13, 14" -- pay attention the spaces after commas
What protocol does the router respond to besides TCP/UDP?
What nmap scan would produce this type of traffic?
